titles.title: Maritime Administration Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 1997
To authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1997 for certain maritime programs of the Department of Transportation, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on National Security.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 4/22/1996--Introduced. Maritime Administration Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 1997 - Authorizes appropriations for the Department of Transportation for FY 1997 for: (1) operations and training activities; and (2) the costs of guaranteed loans authorized by the Merchant Marine Act, 1936, as well as for administrative expenses related to loan guarantee commitments.
